DEMO_414_MSG_010:
̃Mother is a huge AI machine that created this world. 
Some people even refer to her as their god.
ā
DEMO_414_MSG_020:
̃However, one day, Mother started acting erratically. She was... suddenly infected by something, and became "broken".
ā
DEMO_414_MSG_030: ̃Ever since, you and I have been fighting against Mother. It's all we could do to protect our world.
